title: Weight Watchers Points Calculator
description: Calculate SmartPoints for foods and your daily points budget
metaDescription: Free Weight Watchers Points Calculator - Calculate SmartPoints for foods and determine your daily points budget based on your personal information.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This is an unofficial calculator and is not affiliated with WW International, Inc. SmartPoints is a trademark of WW International, Inc. This calculator provides estimates for educational purposes only.

foodPoints.title: Calculate Food Points
foodPoints.description: Enter the nutritional information of your food to calculate its SmartPoints value.

dailyBudget.title: Calculate Daily Points Budget
dailyBudget.description: Enter your personal information to calculate your recommended daily SmartPoints budget.
dailyBudget.budgetExplanation: Your daily SmartPoints budget is the target number of points you should aim for each day. You also receive weekly extra points for flexibility.
